# Read Responses


## Techno

```{r}
tech_resp_ls_raw <- lbr::rd(read_csv, path = "data/Responses", pattern = "Techno")

tech_resp_df1_raw <- tech_resp_ls_raw$Techno_1_resp_essay
tech_resp_df2_raw <- tech_resp_ls_raw$`Techno_2_resp_no-essay`
```

## 319: RS case 4

```{r}
rs4_resp_ls <- lbr::rd(read_csv, path = "data/Responses", pattern = "RS4")
```


```{r}
tech_resp_df1_raw
```

# Read Grades

## Techno Only Numeric Grade

```{r}
tech_grad_ls_raw <- lbr::rd(read_csv, path = "data/Grades", pattern = "_num")

tech_grad_df2_raw <- tech_grad_ls_raw$Techno_2_grade_num
```

## Non-numeric Grades file

```{r}
tech_nograd_df1 <- read_csv("data/Grades/Techno_1_grade_notyet.csv")
```



## Multiple Attempt Grades

```{r}
tm_mgrad_raw <- read_csv("./data/Grades/TM_grade_num_multi.csv")

tm_mgrad_raw
```
